description:
Dressed in a miko’s outfit, Nico and Kuku are helping out Kara’s father, who is the head priest at a shrine. While helping out, Nico uses the spell “Ani-snippy” from shide paper, and creates a moving paper cat. Kara also wanted to create a flying bird, but the shape didn’t come out too well and couldn’t take flight. But the shape she cut out was so terrible that it looks like a “shikigami” and ended up creating a life?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kara and Shiki / Mega Marble Mania Madness / Scramble Scrap Squad
Kara i Shiki / Kulkowe szaleństwo / Rysunkowa ekipa
Kara-chan to Shiki / Kyousou no Biidamania / Scramble Scrap Squad
カラちゃんとシキ / 狂騒のビーダマニア / スクランブル・スクラップ・スクワッド
